attributes.title: What I think about this horrible app
attributes.review: This app is fully horrible and it’s the worst app I’ve seen.  Especially because it’s about Trump and Trump IS NOT my president. Obama is. Trump is so racist and I don’t know why he would be the president of U.S.A when he’s racist because the U.S.A has all different types of ethnicity’s. Trump is just a horrible person and president in general.  This is the worst app in the world and I said it. That’s just how it is. Trump is the worst person and human being. So ya.  Your welcome for my feedback 🙄

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: 👁👄👁I got this app to see the news on my “faVoRiTe” president😻🥰. But instead I got a virus🦠and it’s started glitching🤡🥶. It has a trash set up 🗑 🗑🗑🗑. It also asked for my number, why would I want to give my number👾😼 away If I don’t know them.....but I would if I saw them d-👹👺😪😏 ANYWAYS🥶 I couldn’t use it because it glitches SUPERR⚡️⚡️💥💥💥 bad and it got a virus 🦠 🦠🦠🦠🦠🦠🦠. When I first got it and opened it I saw an orange🍊🍊🍊 YES AN ORANGE🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊 I was SUPER mad. But don’t get this app it’s a waste of time. For reasons I ✨𝓭𝓸𝓷𝓽✨use tiktok

attributes.title: ✨💞Trump 2020✨🤪💞but out of office
attributes.review: Horrible ! I downloaded this app thinking it will give me useful data on our beloved cheeto puff 😋 This app called my family and I very nasty names in 20 different languages! Before hand my phone would work perfectly now every time I open an app the picture of the main man the cheeto himself comes up naked getting a nasty spray tan ! 🤢🤮I can say I feel bad for the tanning lady having to look at a rotten orange . Never download this nasty app , I don’t recommend 0/10.

attributes.title: Worst year ever
attributes.review: App won’t download on my phone!!! And then it’s starts downloading but as it continues downloading a wall started to get build next to me, black lives didn’t matter, Hispanic lives didn’t matter, police continue killing people, children continue being put in cages, the armed forces continues to not be transparent and upfront about the assault and murders of their soldiers at their bases and so I put pause on the app and deleted. Hopefully the world changes. Love and kindness to the world.♥️

attributes.title: Worst app out there
attributes.review: I opened this app and within seconds I started getting hundreds of spam calls from people who said that my mom got kidnapped luckily my mother was in the other room I then tried to close the app and it wouldn’t let me it kept saying vote trump vote trump my phone then started playing Hannah Montana on repeat at a high volume after that it started downloading viruses onto my phone and computer my life is ruined because of this app I don’t recommend

attributes.title: THIS IS A HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app made my pet fishies (btw their names are Gillian🐠, Maximillian🐠, Joshua🐠, Gary🐠, Harry🐠, Sam🐠, Pam🐠, Yam🐠, Cory🐠, Dory🐠, Jenny🐠, Penny🐠, Lenny🐠, Benny🐠, Sarah🐠, Erica🐠, Bill🐠, Phil🐠, Jill🐠, Will🐠, Leonardo🐠, Amy🐠, Steve🐠, Bruce🐠, Amanda🐠, Salamanda🐠, Tom🐠, Tim🐠, Perry🐠, Terry🐠, Frank🐠, Hank🐠, Bank🐠,  Evelyn🐠, Brooklyn🐠, Madelyn🐠, Jocelyn🐠, Katelyn🐠, Adalyn🐠, Adelyn🐠, Raelyn🐠, Madilyn🐠, Ashlyn🐠, Caitlyn🐠, Carolyn🐠, Emalyn🐠, and Brady🐠) all get really bad diarrhea💩. I couldn’t figure out why at first. But then I realized that this app was causing the suffering of my poor fish🐠. To confirm my theory, I tried deleting the app. As soon as I did, all of their problems went away😌.

attributes.title: AWFUL!!!!!
attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever download! after downloading it my brother and mother died. someone then stole my identity and all of my information. i felt as if this app was trying to kill me and ruin my life. also my stove mysteriously blew up 3 minutes after downloading. my luck as been awful after installing this app. every time i get a coffee they mess it up. it’s a cursed app and is very racist, sexist, homophobic, xenophobic, transphobic and quiet honestly a bigot. this app should b considered a hate crime!!!!!!

attributes.title: horrible app can’t even see daddy orange 🍊 🥵
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to get more information on our lovely orange 🥵 but the app just kept crashing i was so distraught that i couldn’t get any updates :( so i tried again but it just kept crashing and my wallpaper was mr trumpie but out of no where it started saying racist slurs 🤯 and talking about weird stuff i don’t recommend using this app it asked for priv information i didn’t give it to them bc i don’t want a cheeto holding on to my info 😰 it quickly knew that i was a person of color 😰😰 it told me to get off the app or they would kidnap my friends bf mom aunt sister dad who has a 4 dog could not let that happen now i can’t even see daddy trumpie 😖😖 oh well horrible app no need to use up ur storage 🥺

attributes.title: DO NOT GET!!
attributes.review:
Once i opened this app it gave me so many glitches! i thought maybe if i left it alone for a little bit it would get better, but it didn’t! it also has been giving me 50 or even 60 notifications a day! i thought this would be a helpful app to learn about what’s going on with our amazing leader. what. a. sHAM!! I don’t understand why anyone would ever keep on with this app, it is so glitchy! 

your very very (disappointed) maga supporter, lucinda.

attributes.title: Trump is worse than the bee movie.
attributes.review:
Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!
